label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_024
content:
## 2024-08-12 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 108
- Active: 92
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 69
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 16

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 37
- Placebo: 36

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.8
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 26.4
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.6
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 367.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 48.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.3
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.6
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.9
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.0
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 2.6
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.1

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.4
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 39.2
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.6
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 320.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 45.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 23.7
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.0
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.1
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.4

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.7
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 50.8
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.2
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 271.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 52.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.9
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.6
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.2
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.9
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.9

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 218
- Sessions Attended: 188
- Attendance Rate (%): 82.2

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.8
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.4
- WBC (k) SD: 1.0
- Platelets (k) Mean: 237
- Platelets (k) SD: 42
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.91
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.19
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 109.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 19.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 25.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 7.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2480, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2433, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2499, Description: muscle spasm, Grade: 2, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2450, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: PM-PD-2432, Description: Missed physical therapy session, not rescheduled within window, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 16 sites
- Physical therapy schedule coordinated across 16 sites

### Notes
- Week 24: Pain management assessments on track. 108 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
